aws_services: KMS, VPC, S3, CloudTrail, IAM, RDS, Secrets Manager, ACM, ALB, Auto Scaling, CloudWatch, WAF, CloudFront, Config, GuardDuty, SNS, SSM
background: Production-grade AWS infrastructure implementing comprehensive security controls with encryption, compliance monitoring, threat detection, and multi-AZ high availability. Single-file Terraform architecture (tap_stack.tf) with 80+ resources, 167 passing tests, environment suffix pattern for parallel deployments, and full AWS Well-Architected Security Pillar compliance.
author: koushik-turing
